item.description:
Learn how to save on the cost of attending industry events that could further your network, extend your customer base and/or give fodder for compelling blog content.

Bill Belew has covered many as well as a variety of industry events in the Bay Area -SES, adTech, SMX, etc. In Vegas - CES2012... in Los Angeles - NAMM,BlogWorldExpo.... In NYC... ClickBankExchange... Kuala Lumpur Malaysia - Asian Publishing Convention, and and and...

The first half of the workshop is free to attend. The second half is reserved for Bill's Business Blogging Network. If you become a member you can stay for the entire event. Go to: http://billbelew.com/subscribe/

At this Meetup, Bill will explain:

1. What it takes to get Press Passes to these events and other industry events of any kind (Free to all)

2. What you need to do BEFORE you apply (Free to all)

3. --Break--

(Members only session begins after the Break).

4. What you need to get his recommendation (For Members only)

5. Q & A (For Members only)

About Bill Belew:

Bill Belew is a professional blogger and pays his Silicon Valley mortgage through revenue from traffic to his network of sites. Bill has taken 10 different and unrelated niche topics to more than 1,000,000 unique visitors EACH and more than 80 million views overall.

Bill is a published author and in-demand speaker: from Thailand to Mexico to India to NYC to San Jose. Bill teaches blogging, SEO and web traffic building to his network of nearly 4,000 Meetup Members in the Bay Area of San Francisco. Bill is also the author of the best read How to Blog for Money series.
item.name: How to Get a Press Pass to Almost Any Industry Event w/ Bill Belew
